Chang's provides the perfect setting for creating lasting memories with loved ones.

About P.F.Chang's Myrtle Beach

Our Myrtle Beach P.F. Chang's serves and Chinese food, including hand-rolled sushi and traditional Chinese dim sum. Many and vegetarian options are also available on our restaurant menu. View our to see which seasonal cocktails are currently being offered. to dine in for lunch or dinner at P.F. Chang's Myrtle Beach, or order online for delivery and takeout from our Myrtle Beach location at . Visit our to view options for catering packages and family meals.
a variety of Asian-inspired dishes gluten-free drink menu Make a reservation order.pfchangs.com catering page

FAQs About P.F. Chang's
Is P.F. Chang's Myrtle Beach vegetarian? 
Yes, P.F. Chang's Myrtle Beach has many vegetarian menu items. Visit to view all vegetarian options.
pfchangs.com/menu Does P.F. Chang’s Myrtle Beach offer catering? 
Yes, P.F. Chang’s Myrtle Beach offers catering for personal and corporate events. Order P.F. Chang's catering online for delivery or pickup at . Redeem catering rewards through P.F. Chang’s Rewards program.
order.pfchangs.com Can I make a reservation at P.F. Chang’s Myrtle Beach? 
Yes. To make an online reservation at P.F. Chang’s Myrtle Beach, please visit . To make a reservation directly, call (843) 839-9470. Reservation availability may vary by location.
pfchangs.com/reservations How do I order online for P.F. Chang’s Myrtle Beach delivery, takeout, and catering? 
You can order delivery, takeout, and catering from our P.F. Chang's Myrtle Beach location by visiting , or by calling (843) 839-9470.
https://order.pfchangs.com/menu/9997 Where is P.F. Chang’s Myrtle Beach located? 
P.F. Chang’s Myrtle Beach is located at 1190 Farrow Pkwy. , Myrtle Beach, SC.
Is P.F. Chang’s Myrtle Beach open? 
Yes, P.F. Chang’s Myrtle Beach is currently open for dine-in, delivery, takeout, and catering. Visit the Myrtle Beach location page for our most recent status on restaurant hours.
Does P.F. Chang's Myrtle Beach offer drinks? 
Yes, P.F. Chang's has a full bar with Asian and craft beer selections, warm and chilled sake, champagne, rosé, white wine, and red wine. View our beverage menu to see our seasonally featured cocktails.
What type of food is P.F. Chang's Myrtle Beach? 
P.F. Chang's Myrtle Beach is a Chinese restaurant serving Mongolian, Thai, Korean, and other pan-Asian dishes.
